title: Surf Lessons in Lima
description: Learn or sharpen your surfing skills during this lesson in Lima. Learn basic techniques such as balancing, popping up, and paddling before heading into the waves. Lima is a popular South American surfing spot, making this a perfect opportunity to test the waters. This tour includes hotel pickup from select areas, plus all surfing equipment.
all_descriptions: Learn or sharpen your surfing skills during this lesson in Lima. Learn basic techniques such as balancing, popping up, and paddling before heading into the waves. Lima is a popular South American surfing spot, making this a perfect opportunity to test the waters. This tour includes hotel pickup from select areas, plus all surfing equipment.

Enjoy pickup from select Lima hotels or meet your guide at a central Lima location before heading off to Playa Mahaka for your surf lesson. This tour includes all equipment such as a wetsuit, wax, and surfboard.

The lesson is divided into three parts: stretching, basic techniques—including balancing, paddling, and popping up—and safety guidelines for the water.

After a tutorial from your instructor, head out into the water and put your skills to the test.

Rustica, CORREDOR, Malecón Corredor S/N, Barranco 15063, PeruAsk for Team Surf Peru ( Alberto) at Rustica main entrance. On summer time we open a tent at sandy beach LOS YUYOS right across public bathrooms. WhatsApp +51997283438
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.
provider:
Team Surf Peru

reviews.title: Alberto will Surf you from A to B. Its in his name.
reviews.text: To learn the skills for surfing and have a great session of waves Alberto is your man! He made sure I was in the right spot at the exact moment. Returned the mext day for a second session and saw my skills continue to improve.

reviews.title: Wonderful experience! Incredible teaching! Would highly recommend!
reviews.text: We booked a surf lesson with Team Surf Perú for two first-time surfers! We had a wonderful experience, Kerry was an exceptional teacher!! Super patient and we got very individualized help and feedback. I’m so glad we did this while in Lima! It was a great experience for beginner surfers though I’m sure that team surf Perú is more than capable of teaching advanced surfers too! Kerry was very kind and gave fantastic Lima recommendations as well! I’m super grateful to team surf Perú for making our time surfing in Lima epic! 🤙

reviews.title: Great instruction and gear.
reviews.text: Alberto is a great surf sup instructor with the best equipment.  He has a large quiver of the top Starboard boards for all abilities.  I am a beginner, but he can instructor at the expert level.  Lots of great tips from him and his assistant Kerry.  Location is perfect for SUP.

reviews.title: Great time with Team Surf Peru!
reviews.text: A lot of fun! My wife and I did a 1-hour surf lesson with Team Surf Peru in Lima. Kerry and Alberto were great! They explain very well, they have all you need in terms of equipment and they value safety. We enjoyed it a lot and managed to stand on the board 🎉 Definitely recommend Team Surf Peru for surfing lessons in Lima!

reviews.title: Best surfing lesson ever
reviews.text: The lesson is amazing, coach is very knowledgeable and friendly, wave is nice to catch, highly recommended for beginners.

reviews.title: A great experience!
reviews.text: Alberto and Kerry were great.  Easy to find and lots of fun for a novice surfer.  Even I caught some waves - who knew!  Thank you!

reviews.title: Solo surf lessons
reviews.text: I took surf lessons on two mornings during my time in Lima. The team was attentive and professional to where I saw my performance definitely improve. There's a reason why I went twice! Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Amazing surf lessons and the best people!
reviews.text: Amazing surf lessons and the best people! Our instructor Kerry made sure that we caught a lot of waves and we had the best time surfing with her. If you are in Lima you need to take a surf lesson with these guys.

reviews.title: Great teacher, great price
reviews.text: Alberto and Valerie were great teachers, first ever surf lesson, booked 2 days in a row and my confidence progressed massively. Alberto has so many experience, very enjoyable and will continue my surf journey thanks to the help of the team

reviews.title: Great surf lessons in Lima
reviews.text: Incredible lessons in Lima, great instructors, knowledgeable, helpful, accommodating, ended up going 2 days in a row! If you want surf lessons in Lima, how with Serf Peru!
